relevant_findings.description: U.S. House Select Committee investigating Kennedy and King assassinations seeking leads in Portugal, UK, and Mexico related to James Earl Ray
relevant_findings.direct_quote: INTEND TO PURSUE LEADS IN PORTUGAL, UK AND MEXICO RELATING TO JAMES EARL RAY, CURRENTLY SERVING TIME FOR KING, MURDER.
relevant_findings.significance: Indicates international investigation into assassination connections, showing potential cross-border intelligence gathering

relevant_findings.description: Committee seeking to establish diplomatic relationships to aid investigation
relevant_findings.direct_quote: MR. G. ROBERT BLAKEY, CHIEF COUNSEL AND STAFF DIRECTOR OF COMMITTEE SAYS SELECT COMMITTEE TOLD STATE THAT HE WANTS TO ESTABLISH 'CORDIAL RELATIONSHIP' WITH APPROPRIATE PORTUGUESE NATIONAL POLICE
relevant_findings.significance: Reveals active diplomatic efforts to gather information about potential assassination leads

relevant_findings.description: Secret-level communication discussing cooperation with Blakey and committee investigation
relevant_findings.direct_quote: STATIONS ARE SOLICITED FOR ADVICE OR ASSISTANCE. RTACTION IS COOPERATING FULLY WITH BLAKEY AND COMMITTEE INCLUDING ALLOWING THEM ACCESS TO DIRECTORATE RECORDS
relevant_findings.significance: Indicates potential CIA involvement and cooperation with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (Blakey's committee) investigating the JFK assassination

relevant_findings.description: Guidance on handling witness and police interviews
relevant_findings.direct_quote: BELIEVE COMMITTEE'S EFFORTS TO INTERVIEW POLICE AND WITNESSES... IS LARGELY OVERT FUNCTION WHICH CAN BEST BE HANDLED BY LEGATS OR OTHERS
relevant_findings.significance: Suggests strategic approach to managing witness testimonies and potential information control
